articles.title: Ted Cruz defends Tony Dungy as 'hero' amid media onslaught
articles.description: Pro Football Hall of Fame coach Tony Dungy was hit with a media blitz ahead of his Friday speech at the March for Life, but Sen. Ted Cruz for one had his back.

articles.author: Pete Thamel
articles.title: Michigan fires Matt Weiss amid computer access crimes investigation
articles.description: The University of Michigan announced it has fired co-offensive coordinator Matt Weiss, who is under investigation by university police for "a report of computer access crimes" at the school's football facility.
